about_the_game:
Amidst an interstellar conflict, Earth has found itself trapped in the crossfire. Under relentless attack, humanity's only hope for survival lies in a daring escape into space. A colony ship embarks on a perilous journey through enemy lines, tasked with finding and securing a new homeland in safer territories. You are entrusted with the vital mission of safely escorting this vessel and leading this mission to success. Cynically dubbed "The Last Mission" by some, it may indeed be humanity’s final chance.

The Last Mission is an auto-battler and space battle simulation game where you command a fleet of spacecraft in vast, strategic battles. Equip, configure and upgrade them to be ready to battle the enemy.

Build Your Fleet
Discover the strengths and weaknesses of a variety of unique ships—from nimble fighters to massive battleships. Arm them with a diverse array of weapon and support modules, and combine their abilities to maximize your firepower in battle.

Command Your Fleet
Strategically position your fleet on the battlefield and assign commands to each ship. Destroy your enemies from a safe distance, or sow chaos with a swift advance into enemy lines.

Watch Your Fleet in Action
Once preparations are complete, the battle begins. Observe as your plans and strategies unfold on the battlefield, with laser beams slicing through the air and machine guns rattling.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 and above (64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel, AMD 4 cores CPU at 3Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ R9 290, NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
